disclaimer: Kalshi fees are variable by market and probability. Verify before trading.
description: Kalshi fees scale with probability - higher fees near 50%, lower at edges

base_fees.notes: Base rates - actual fees vary by market probability

probability_curve.description: Fee multiplier based on contract price (probability)

settlement_fee.notes: No separate settlement fee as of 2026

notes: Fees are charged on contract value, not profit
Probability-based scaling means lower fees at extreme odds
